name: 林美如
objective: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
schedule:
w1.Functions and Models：New Functions from Old Functions
w2.Functions and Models：Exponential Functions
w3.Functions and Models：Inverse Functions and Logarithms
w4.Limits and Derivatives：The Limit of a Function、Calculating Limits Using the Limit Laws
w5.Limits and Derivatives：Continuity、Limits Involving Infinity、Tangents, Velocities, and Other Rates of Change
w6. Limits and Derivatives：Derivatives、The Derivative as a Function、What Does Say about  ?
w7.Differentiation Rules：Derivative of Polynomials and Exponential Functions、The Product and Quotient Rules、Rates of change in the Natural and Social Sciences
w8. Differentiation Rules：Derivative of Trigonometric Functions、The Chain Rule、Implicit Differentiation
w9. Midterm test、Derivative of Logarithmic Functions
w10.Differentiation Rules：Linear Approximation and Differentials
w11.Applications of Differentiation：Related Rates、Maximum and Minimum Values、Derivatives and the Shapes of Curves
w12.Applications of Differentiation：Indeterminate Forms and l’Hospital’s Rule
w13.Applications of Differentiation：Optimization Problems、Newton’s Method、Antiderivatives
w14.Integrals：Areas and Distances、The Definite Integral
w15. Integrals：Evaluating Definite Integrals、The Fundamental Theorem of Calculus、The Substitution Rule
w16. Integrals：Integration by Parts
w17. Integrals：Additional Techniques of Integration
w18. Terminal test
materials:
書名 : CALCULUS （Concepts and Contexts 3E）
作者 : James Stewart
出版社 : 東華書局
